cs351.utility

Class WorkerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • cs351.utility.WorkerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class WorkerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is the WorkerThread class used by the job system. Its threads are managed internally and there is no handle to get a reference to them from the job system itself.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkerThread(int threadID, ParallelJobSystem jobSystem)
      Creates a new WorkerThread object with the given threadID and a parallel job system reference for callbacks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addJobGroup(ParallelJobGroup group)
      Adds a job group to its internal list of jobs that it needs to work on in parallel with other worker threads.
      void run() 
      void terminate()
      Lets the thread know it needs to terminate.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkerThread

        public WorkerThread(int threadID,
                    ParallelJobSystem jobSystem)
        Creates a new WorkerThread object with the given threadID and a parallel job system reference for callbacks.
        Parameters:
        threadID - id to associate with this worker
        jobSystem - parallel job system reference for callbacks

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Lets the thread know it needs to terminate. It will not immediately kill itself as it may be in the middle of working on some jobs, but at the next check it will see that it needs to quit.

      • addJobGroup

        public void addJobGroup(ParallelJobGroup group)
        Adds a job group to its internal list of jobs that it needs to work on in parallel with other worker threads.
        Parameters:
        group - job group to add to its internal list
